alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 28 at 12:47PM CDT until April 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Near-Critical to Critical Fire Weather Saturday... .Gusty winds, warm temperatures, and low humidity readings will produce an environment favorable for wildfire growth tomorrow. Therefore, a fire weather watch was needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 003, 004, 016, AND 081... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton and Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...Northwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 19 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
